 31namespace vsip

 34namespace impl

 36
 37template <dimension_type Dim,
 38	  typename       T,
 39	  typename       LayoutT = Layout<Dim, 
 40					  typename impl::Row_major<Dim>::type,
 41					  Stride_unit_dense,
 42					  Cmplx_inter_fmt>,
 43	  typename       MapT = Local_map>
 44class Us_block
 45  : impl::Non_copyable,
 46    public impl::Ref_count<Us_block<Dim, T, LayoutT, MapT> >
 47{
 48  // Compile-time values and types.
 49public:
 50  static dimension_type const dim = Dim;
 51
 52  typedef T        value_type;
 53  typedef T&       reference_type;
 54  typedef T const& const_reference_type;
 55
 56  typedef typename LayoutT::order_type order_type;
 57  typedef MapT                         map_type;
 58
 59  // Enable Direct_data access to data.
 60  template <typename, typename, typename>
 61  friend class impl::data_access::Low_level_data_access;
 62
 63  // Implementation types.
 64public:
 65  typedef LayoutT                                    layout_type;
 66  typedef impl::Applied_layout<layout_type>          applied_layout_type;
 67  typedef Storage<typename LayoutT::complex_type, T> storage_type;
 68
 69  // Constructors and destructor.
 70public:
 71  Us_block(Domain<Dim> const&          dom,
 72	   typename storage_type::type ptr,
 73	   MapT const&                 map = MapT())
 74  VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
 75    : layout_ (dom),
 76      storage_(ptr),
 77      map_    (map)
 78  { assert(!storage_type::is_null(storage_)); }
 79
 80  ~Us_block() VSIP_NOTHROW {}
 81
 82  // Data accessors.
 83public:
 84
 85  // 1-dimensional accessors
 86  T get(index_type idx) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 87  {
 88    assert(idx < size());
 89    return storage_type::get(storage_, idx);
 90  }
 91
 92  void put(index_type idx, T val) VSIP_NOTHROW
 93  {
 94    assert(idx < size());
 95    storage_type::put(storage_, idx, val);
 96  }
 97
 98  // 2-diminsional get/put
 99  T    get(index_type idx0, index_type idx1) const VSIP_NOTHROW
100    { return storage_type::get(storage_, layout_.index(idx0, idx1)); }
101  void put(index_type idx0, index_type idx1, T val) VSIP_NOTHROW
102    { storage_type::put(storage_, layout_.index(idx0, idx1), val); }
103
104  // 3-diminsional get/put
105  T    get(index_type idx0, index_type idx1, index_type idx2)
106    const VSIP_NOTHROW
107    { return storage_type::get(storage_, layout_.index(idx0, idx1, idx2)); }
108  void put(index_type idx0, index_type idx1, index_type idx2, T val)
109    VSIP_NOTHROW
110    { storage_type::put(storage_, layout_.index(idx0, idx1, idx2), val); }
111
112  // Accessors.
113public:
114  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW;
115  length_type size(dimension_type D, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW;
116  MapT const& map() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return map_;}
117
118  // Support Direct_data interface.
119public:
120  typedef typename storage_type::type       data_type;
121  typedef typename storage_type::const_type const_data_type;
122
123  data_type       impl_data()       VSIP_NOTHROW { return storage_; }
124  const_data_type impl_data() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return storage_; }
125  stride_type impl_stride(dimension_type D, dimension_type d)
126    const VSIP_NOTHROW;
127
128  // Member Data.
129public:
130  applied_layout_type layout_;
131  data_type           storage_;
132  map_type            map_;
133};
134
135
136
137/// Specialize block layout trait for Us_block blocks.
138
139template <dimension_type Dim,
140	  typename       T,
141	  typename       LayoutT,
142	  typename       Map>
143struct Block_layout<Us_block<Dim, T, LayoutT, Map> >
144{
145  static dimension_type const dim = Dim;
146
147  typedef Direct_access_tag access_type;
148  typedef typename LayoutT::order_type   order_type;
149  typedef typename LayoutT::pack_type    pack_type;
150  typedef typename LayoutT::complex_type complex_type;
151
152  typedef Layout<dim, order_type, pack_type, complex_type> layout_type;
153};
154
155/// Specialize lvalue accessor trait for Us_blocks.  Us_block provides
156/// direct lvalue accessors via impl_ref.
157
158template <typename BlockT,
159	  bool     use_proxy =
160	              Is_complex<typename BlockT::value_type>::value &&
161                      Type_equal<typename Block_layout<BlockT>::complex_type,
162				 Cmplx_split_fmt>::value>
163struct Us_block_lvalue_factory_type;
164
165template <typename BlockT>
166struct Us_block_lvalue_factory_type<BlockT, false>
167{
168  typedef True_lvalue_factory<BlockT> type;
169  template <typename OtherBlock>
170  struct Rebind {
171    typedef True_lvalue_factory<OtherBlock> type;
172  };
173};
174
175template <typename BlockT>
176struct Us_block_lvalue_factory_type<BlockT, true>
177{
178  typedef Proxy_lvalue_factory<BlockT> type;
179  template <typename OtherBlock>
180  struct Rebind {
181    typedef Proxy_lvalue_factory<OtherBlock> type;
182  };
183};
184
185template <dimension_type Dim,
186	  typename       T,
187	  typename       LayoutT>
188struct Lvalue_factory_type<Us_block<Dim, T, LayoutT, Local_map> >
189  : public Us_block_lvalue_factory_type<Us_block<Dim, T, LayoutT, Local_map> >
190{};
191
192
193
194/// Specialize Distributed_local_block traits class for Us_block.
195
196/// For a serial map, distributed block and local block are the same.
197
198template <dimension_type Dim,
199	  typename       T,
200	  typename       LayoutT>
201struct Distributed_local_block<Us_block<Dim, T, LayoutT, Local_map> >
202{
203  typedef Us_block<Dim, T, LayoutT, Local_map> type;
204};
205
206
207
208/// For a distributed map, local block has a serial map.
209
210template <dimension_type Dim,
211	  typename       T,
212	  typename       LayoutT,
213	  typename       MapT>
214struct Distributed_local_block<Us_block<Dim, T, LayoutT, MapT> >
215{
216  // We could determine the local block by just chaning the map
217  // to serial:
218  //   typedef Us_block<Dim, T, LayoutT, Local_map> type;
219
220  // However, to be safe, we'll extract it from the block itself:
221  // (local_block is set in the base class Distributed_block.)
222  typedef typename Us_block<Dim, T, LayoutT, MapT>::local_block_type type;
223};
224
225
226
227/// Overload of get_local_block for Us_block with serial map.
228
229template <dimension_type Dim,
230	  typename       T,
231	  typename       OrderT>
232Us_block<Dim, T, OrderT, Local_map>&
233get_local_block(
234  Us_block<Dim, T, OrderT, Local_map>& block)
235{
236  return block;
237}
238
239template <dimension_type Dim,
240	  typename       T,
241	  typename       OrderT>
242Us_block<Dim, T, OrderT, Local_map> const&
243get_local_block(
244  Us_block<Dim, T, OrderT, Local_map> const& block)
245{
246  return block;
247}
248
249
250
251/// Overload of get_local_block for Us_block with distributed map.
252
253template <dimension_type Dim,
254	  typename       T,
255	  typename       OrderT,
256	  typename       MapT>
257Us_block<Dim, T, OrderT, Local_map>&
258get_local_block(
259  Us_block<Dim, T, OrderT, MapT> const& block)
260{
261  return block.get_local_block();
262}
263
264
265
266/// Assert that subblock is local to block (overload).
267
268template <dimension_type Dim,
269	  typename       T,
270	  typename       OrderT>
271void
272assert_local(
273  Us_block<Dim, T, OrderT, Local_map> const& block,
274  index_type                              sb)
275{
276  assert(sb == 0);
277}
278
279
280
281/// Assert that subblock is local to block (overload).
282
283template <dimension_type Dim,
284	  typename       T,
285	  typename       OrderT,
286	  typename       MapT>
287void
288assert_local(
289  Us_block<Dim, T, OrderT, MapT> const& block,
290  index_type                         sb)
291{
292  block.assert_local(sb);
293}

297/// Specialize Is_simple_distributed_block traits class for Us_block.
298
299template <dimension_type Dim,
300	  typename       T,
301	  typename       OrderT,
302	  typename       MapT>
303struct Is_simple_distributed_block<Us_block<Dim, T, OrderT, MapT> >
304{
305  static bool const value = true;
306};

310#if VSIP_IMPL_USE_GENERIC_VISITOR_TEMPLATES==0
311
312/// Specialize Combine_return_type for Us_block block leaves.
313
314template <typename       CombineT,
315	  dimension_type Dim,
316	  typename       T,
317	  typename       OrderT,
318	  typename       MapT>
319struct Combine_return_type<CombineT, Us_block<Dim, T, OrderT, MapT> >
320{
321  typedef Us_block<Dim, T, OrderT, MapT> block_type;
322  typedef typename CombineT::template return_type<block_type>::type
323		type;
324  typedef typename CombineT::template tree_type<block_type>::type
325		tree_type;
326};
327
328
329
330/// Specialize apply_combine for Us_block block leaves.
331
332template <typename       CombineT,
333	  dimension_type Dim,
334	  typename       T,
335	  typename       OrderT,
336	  typename       MapT>
337typename Combine_return_type<CombineT, Us_block<Dim, T, OrderT, MapT> >::type
338apply_combine(
339  CombineT const&                    combine,
340  Us_block<Dim, T, OrderT, MapT> const& block)
341{
342  return combine.apply(block);
343}
344#endif

348/***********************************************************************
349  Definitions - Us_blocks
350***********************************************************************/
351
352/// Return the total size of the block.
353
354template <dimension_type Dim,
355	  typename       T,
356	  typename       LayoutT,
357	  typename       MapT>
358length_type
359Us_block<Dim, T, LayoutT, MapT>::size() const VSIP_NOTHROW
360{
361  length_type retval = layout_.size(0);
362  for (dimension_type d=1; d<Dim; ++d)
363    retval *= layout_.size(d);
364  return retval;
365}
366
367
368
369/// Return the size of the block in a specific dimension.
370
371/// Requires:
372///   BLOCK_DIM selects which block-dimensionality (BLOCK_DIM == 1).
373///   DIM is the dimension whose length to return (0 <= DIM < BLOCK_DIM).
374/// Returns:
375///   The size of dimension DIM.
376
377template <dimension_type Dim,
378	  typename       T,
379	  typename       LayoutT,
380	  typename       MapT>
381inline
382length_type
383Us_block<Dim, T, LayoutT, MapT>::size(
384  dimension_type block_dim,
385  dimension_type d)
386  const VSIP_NOTHROW
387{
388  assert((block_dim == 1 || block_dim == Dim) && (d < block_dim));
389  return (block_dim == 1) ? this->size() : this->layout_.size(d);
390}
391
392
393
394// Requires:
395//   DIM is a valid dimensionality supported by block (DIM == 1 or 2)
396//   D is a dimension, less than DIM.
397// Returns
398//   The stride in dimension D, for dimensionality DIM.
399
400template <dimension_type Dim,
401	  typename       T,
402	  typename       LayoutT,
403	  typename       MapT>
404inline
405stride_type
406Us_block<Dim, T, LayoutT, MapT>::impl_stride(
407  dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d)
408  const VSIP_NOTHROW
409{
410  assert((block_dim == 1 || block_dim == Dim) && (d < block_dim));
411
412  return (block_dim == 1) ? 1 : layout_.stride(d);
413}
